name: Monster Shooter The Lost Levels
description:
More levels, more enemies, more weapons, more fun.... Exclusive special edition for all Mac gamers. This is the best Monster Shooter so far.

Monster Shooter The Lost Levels is the premium edition of quite possibly the best shooter game ever – with brand-new content and exclusive features!

★★★ "Exploding Alien Faces Is Quite Fun, Actually" - TouchArcade review ★★★

Your mission: survive wave after wave of alien baddies and save the cute, cuddly kitten. Find all you need to annihilate your extraterrestrial antagonists in the fully-stocked armory. Upgrade your weapons to unleash even greater destruction. Improve your chances of success with useful perks and items. Challenge your friends to beat your high-score in Survival Mode. Will you emerge victorious? Time will tell. The only thing we can guarantee is many, many hours of the most exciting gameplay you’ll find on your Mac!

TRY IT FOR FREE AND UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

➱ 80 challenging levels on 4 different planets
➱ 12 upgradeable weapons
➱ Over 100 missions
➱ Ultra-cute hand-drawn 2D graphics
➱ Stunning visual and audio effects
